name: Brightify
tagline: It´s not about what, but how.
description:
Brightify is a software development company focusing on mobile app development for iOS platform. In our five years of existence we have created several interesting projects.
Our company is focusing on the development of mobile apps but we have experience with implementing backend solutions for heavy traffic as well.
Our experience with backend solutions is an advantage over our competition, since we are able to approach a project from a more complex perspective and therefore deliver a high-quality product. Our priority is a first-quality and clean code.
